text: Jonathan Sirney Haagensen Cerqueira (born February 23, 1983) is a Brazilian actor, model and singer. He started his career in 2000 in Palace II, a special episode of the series Brava Gente. He gained national and international fame in 2002 in the film City of God, acted in some soap operas such as Da Cor do Pecado in 2004, Paraíso Tropical in 2007 and Os Mutantes in 2008. Jonathan is twin brother of actor Phellipe Haagensen. Haagensen was born in Rio de Janeiro. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Movie Role Notes 2000 Brava Gente Madrugão Episode: "Palace II" 2002 City of God Shaggy Movie Seja O Que Deus Quiser Cassú Movie 2002–2005 City of Men Madrugão 2003 Jovens Tardes Himself Presenter 2004 A Diarista Paulão Episode: "Cabelo Programado" Da Cor do Pecado Adroaldo da Silva (Dodô) O Diabo a Quatro João Vítor (China) Movie 2006 Sob Nova Direção Djailson O Passageiro - Segredos de Adulto theater student Movie 2007 Paraíso Tropical Cláudio City of Men - The Movie Madrugão Movie 2008 Os Mutantes Miguel Ângelo Embarque Imediato Wagner Movie 2009 A Fazenda Himself Contenstant 2010 Bróder Jaiminho Movie 2012 Cidade de Deus - 10 anos depois Himself documental 2015 Vai Que Cola: O Filme Carlos Movie 2016 Mais Forte Que O Mundo Drug dealer (Adolfo) Movie 2017 Me Chama de Bruna José Ricardo Rios (JR) 2018 Carcereiros Baiano Pacto de Sangue Trucco Ilha de Ferro Diablo 2020 Onisciente Vinícius Moreira == References == == Other websites == * . * Jonathan Haagensen on Instagram.
